INSERT ALL
INTO ICS_XO_GIFT_EXP_LIST ( GIFT_NO, ISSUE_DATE, EXPIRED_DATE, EXTEND_YN, EXTINCTION_DATE, GIFT_AMOUNT, STATUS, ACCFLAG, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER ) VALUES ( #[].gift_no#, #[].issue_date#, #[].expired_date#, #[].extend_yn#, #[].extinction_date#, #[].gift_amount#, #[].status#, '0', sysdate, 'XO_BATCH' )
SELECT 1 FROM dual
